name: Strategist
description: Life is all about achieving goals and dodging obstacles. In this brainteasing game, you use your mind to determine a path you will engage with your body. This mind boggling game inspires you to think before you do. Even more so, before thinking about taking action you are encouraged to observe.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Pentium 4 or higher, 2GHz Memory: 1 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB or higher Storage: 200 MB available space
